attributes.action: ban the use of all animals in circuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The circus is no place for an animal. The life for an animal in a circus consists of frequent travel, restricted movements, poor living conditions and loud noises.  This treatment should not still be legal!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
